QuestData.Title: I MADE You!
QuestData.Description:
I have had it with this insolence!
I have an idea to reset this Mnemis's personality, but you will need to keep it busy.
It will try to fight you, through whatever means it posseses. I suggest you try not to perish. Kleia can hold her own, so hide behind her if so inclined.
Hop to it!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Mnemis units are usually helpful. This one is not. Mikanikos believes some manual recalibration is in order.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope you will forgive my behavior. I was not feeling quite like myself.
